Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Establishes a temporary practice authorization program for certain medical professionals to practice in underserved areas
Summary: Establishes a temporary practice authorization program for physicians, registered nurses and licensed practical nurses to practice in underserved areas.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a temporary practice authorization pilot program for certain medical and dental professionals to practice in underserved areas; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
